TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback(object collection, object collectionItems);
.class public auto ansi sealed XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback(collection As Object, collectionItems As Object)
public delegate void XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback(System::Object ^ collection, System::Object ^ collectionItems);
type XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback = delegate of obj * obj -> unit

param.name: collection
param.span: 將集合項目陣列複製到其中的集合。

span.span: The collection into which the collection items array is copied.

param.name: collectionItems
param.span: 要複製到「物件集合」中的項目陣列。

span.span: An array of items to be copied into the object collection.

summary.span: 針對 SOAP 編碼之 XML 資料類型 (已對應至集合或列舉) 的還原序列化， 類別所使用的委派。

span.span: Delegate used by the class for deserialization of SOAP-encoded XML data types that map to collections or enumerations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在初始化期間，.NET Framework 的 XML 序列化基礎結構以動態方式產生並編譯暫時類別還原序列化衍生自類別。During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the class. 在此過程中，.NET Framework 會產生集合使用的修復方法委派。During this process, the .NET Framework generates collection fix-up methods that use the delegate. 發生這種情況的 SOAP 編碼陣列或 SOAP 編碼多重參考項目資料類型，在任一情況下，對應至.NET Framework 集合或列舉。This occurs for SOAP-encoded arrays or SOAP-encoded, multi-reference elements whose data types, in either case, map to .NET Framework collections or enumerations. 視需要收集修正方法是還原序列化期間呼叫。As necessary, the collection fix-up method is called during deserialization. 您應該直接具現化。You should not directly instantiate . SOAP 編碼為 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
